trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Peoria
There were no other sightings in Peoria on or around February 17th 2009
Summary: Large very high object in sky. Stationary for 11 mins then took off and up.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking in the sky at a bird when I saw a large silvery object in the east sky. it looked like a balloon very high in the sky. It was not lit up, it was a grey dark silver color. It was too high to be a balloon and it did not move. After 7 minutes I asked my dad to look at it. He was puzzled and continued to watch for about 5 mins. then it started to move and with in 30 seconds it was gone. My father was in the airforce and he was actually very surprised by what he saw, myself as well.. I have seen ufos befor, never in the day light..... thank you
